channel.title: 72pines on Martin Liu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 72pines on Martin Liu's Blog

item.title: At end of 2009
item.description: Martin Liu’s blog move to 72pines. I will see how long I could still here. Let’s say 6 months.[fergcorp_cdt_single date=“1 June 2010”]To do list[add] I’d like to blog more about C-Bank CMDB project implement.[add] I hope I could have sometime for playing with open source software, like opennms, zenoss, otrs, etc…[del] All of duplicate blog post will be deleted from some of my old blog site, including blogspot, chinaunix, msn space etc…To be continued….
